text: We are working on developing a "ladies tech brunch". If you would like to participate.

contact_text: Tweet PyLadies Chicago co-organizer Lorena your story!

text: Have a Python open source project you'd like to share with Chicago PyLadies? We're working on creating another OSS event and need more projects.
